verbs.description: [ARG0: Liberal comedian Samantha Bee] [V: apologized] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: for a very explicit epithet she used to attack Ivanka Trump in order to criticize President Trump 's policies] , and it may have to do with advertisers fleeing her cable show . Here 's what Bee said Bee tweeted an apology Thursday after a public uproar over her very pointed insult to the president 's daughter . https://twitter.com/iamsambee/status/1002252496532856832 " I would like to sincerely apologize to Ivanka Trump and to my viewers for using an expletive on my show to describe her last night , " Bee tweeted . " It was inappropriate and inexcusable , " she added . " I crossed a line , and I deeply regret it . " Bee hosts a comedy show on TBS , and advertisers began dropping the show after the public outrage over her comments . " Thank you to those who reached out regarding our sponsorship of Full Frontal , " tweeted the account for " AutoTrader . " https://twitter.com/AutoTrader_com/status/1002237396396756994 " The comments expressed by Samantha Bee were offensive and unacceptable and do not reflect the views of …

Liberal comedian Samantha Bee apologized Thursday for a very explicit epithet she used to attack Ivanka Trump in order to criticize President Trump 's policies , and it may have to do with advertisers fleeing her cable show . Here 's what Bee said Bee tweeted an apology Thursday after a public uproar over her very pointed insult to the president 's daughter . https://twitter.com/iamsambee/status/1002252496532856832 " I would like to sincerely apologize to Ivanka Trump and to my viewers for using an expletive on my show to describe her last night , " Bee tweeted . " It was inappropriate and inexcusable , " she added . " I crossed a line , and I deeply regret it . " Bee hosts a comedy show on TBS , and advertisers began dropping the show after the public outrage over her comments . " Thank you to those who reached out regarding our sponsorship of Full Frontal , " tweeted the account for " AutoTrader . " https://twitter.com/AutoTrader_com/status/1002237396396756994 " The comments expressed by Samantha Bee were offensive and unacceptable and [V: do] not reflect the views of …
